event.name: Intro Game coms
event.incoming_comms_text: All Captains be aware! There is a large enemy fleet heading to this sector and we MUST evacuate. Cover the transports and keep the enemy at bay until we have completed the Evac! Sensors have them at about five minutes out so you have then to prepare. God Speed!

log.text: wereareyou=1 Intro 5 min, 3 ships spawn

event.name: Start Game coms
event.incoming_comms_text: You have five minutes to Prepare

event.name: Middle Game com
event.incoming_comms_text: You have five minutes to Prepare

event.name: End Game com
event.incoming_comms_text: You have five minutes to Prepare

log.text: wereareyou=|wereareyou| 1) Intro 2)Start 3)Middle 4)End
wereareyou=|wereareyou| 1) Intro 2)Start 3)Middle 4)End

event.name: end invasion timer
event.incoming_comms_text: Thats it! We are pulling out of this sector. Protect any remaining transports then jump out of this sector.

event.name: All players out
event.incoming_comms_text: All transports are out of this sector. Sector is unlocked! Retrete to -2.2 for further information.

log.text: END OF GAME!! Ships that got out=|WhoGotOut| Needed to win=12

event.name: Did good las mission
event.incoming_comms_text: We were able to get enough intell from the retreating shuttles that we set up a defence and are awaiting for the enemy fleet.

event.name: Did not do so good last mission
event.incoming_comms_text: We just made out the intell from the shuttles. Unfortunately we didn't have enough time to prepared.

event.name: Start script
event.incoming_comms_text: It looks like the enemy is massing and getting ready for an all out attack. Intell has them 2 minutes out!

event.name: End credits
event.incoming_comms_text: This is the last wave!

event.name: When havaing travlers
event.incoming_comms_text: We are an unarmed and transporting passangers to CivB-02 in sector 2,0

event.name: When havaing travlers
event.incoming_comms_text: We are an unarmed and going to pick-up passangers at CivB-02 in sector 2,-2

event.name: Button pushed
event.incoming_comms_text: Hold close to the cargo ship within 500 units while we get a lock.

event.name: Found Nothing
event.incoming_comms_text: We were not able to get a lock on the cargo ship. Please be within 500 units of the cargo vessel.
